name: World of Blocks (itch)
description:
World of Blocks is a small game I started making in my free time. After awhile, I kind of gave up on it, as it would be close to impossible to get this game to the way I wanted it to be. If you couldn't tell, it's based off of Minecraft. Anyways, I actually lost the source code, it was on a flash drive, and I misplaced it about a year ago, so I can't continue updating this even if I wanted to.

Controls:

WASD: Movement.

'C': Change current world.
